name: FormatOptions
shortdesc: The options for saving a JPEG file.

property.name: STANDARDBASELINE
property.shortdesc: Baseline (Standard). Recognized by most web browsers.

property.name: OPTIMIZEDBASELINE
property.shortdesc: Baseline (Optimized). Optimized color and a slightly reduced file size.

property.name: PROGRESSIVE
property.shortdesc: Displays a series of increasingly detailed scans as the image downloads.
